character.name: Oldna Poseidal
character.description:
Originally from the planet Gastogal, Oldna Poseidal is the main antagonist of the show, having taken over all 5 planets of the Pentagona system. The mysterious Poseidal rarely appears in public and when so often appears via hologram. Through the power of bio-relation she has eternal youth and has the ability to control others, such as Quwasan Olibee.
In reality, "Poseidal" is Mian Ku Ha Attsher, a former Temple Knight of the true Poseidal, who hides under the name Amandara Kamandara. Having fallen in love with him, she agreed to take his place but fell completely under his control and largely became a puppet of his, so much so that she believed she really was Poseidal. To keep up the facade she wears a bizarre costume, including makeup and contact lenses. As the years passed, Poseidal`s bio-relation weakened and Mian was able to think more for herself, particularly after the involvement of Full Flat. When Poseidal returns to Gastogal to return to his true role, she is able to deactive the bio-relation system that retains their eternal youth and she immediately ages to death.

character.name: Gaw Ha Leccee
character.description: Gaw Ha Leccee is a trainee for the Poseidal Military`s Elite 13 unit, stationed on the planet Koam. When Daba and the others steal a shuttle to head to the planet Mizun, Leccee goes on board in an attempt to get it back. After landing on Mizun she follows Daba and his friends, eventually deciding to defect from the military to join them due to falling in love with Daba. Leccee is constantly in arguments with Amu over him. She is a skilled Heavy Metal pilot. Eventually Leccee becomes frustrated with the rebel movement and leaves them, joining up with Amandara Kamandara`s group and acting as captain for the space shuttle Whale. She continues to assist Daba and the others throughout the rest of the conflict.

character.name: Gablae Gavlet
character.description:
An ambitious man from Koam who seeks to join the Poseidal military. Gavlet encounters Daba, Amu, Kyao and Lilith in the woods and a feud starts between them when he steals their food and attacks Lilith, considering her to be a bad omen. Through a recommendation from Amandara Kamandara he joins the Poseidal military and pursues Daba and the others from planet to planet, eventually being promoted to tactical adviser of the shuttle Slender Skala, and later to the Elite 13 under Giwaza Lowau. Gavlet pilots a number of different Heavy Metals but is constantly defeated in battle by Daba.
Gavlet eventually defects to the rebel`s side after falling in love with Daba`s sister, Quwasan Olibee.

character.name: Daba Myroad
character.description:
Main character and pilot of the L-Gaim. Daba is a strong pilot and leader. Originally from the planet Mizun, he travels across the Pentagona Worlds, initially to return a cash card to the mysterious Amandara Kamandara, but also leads rebel groups in an attempt to defeat Oldna Poseidal.
In reality Daba is prince of the Yaman Clan, the civilization that ruled Mizun and was overthrown by Poseidal`s conquest. Daba, whose real name is Kamon Myroad seeks to overthrow Poseidal in order to attain justice for the Yaman Clan as well as his father.

character.name: Fanneria Amu
character.description: An aspiring actress who joins up with a group of bandits on the planet Koam. When Amu meets Daba and Kyao, in an attempt to steal the L-Gaim, she falls in love with Daba and leaves the bandits to join them. She constantly fights with Leccee over Daba`s affections, despite the fact that he only rarely shows feelings for her. Amu doesn`t have much talent, but grows into a rebel leader over the course of the series; captaining the shuttle Turner and eventually becoming the pilot of the L-Gaim once the L-Gaim Mark II is developed.

character.name: Mirao Kyao
character.description: Best friend of Daba from the planet Koam. Kyao is a skilled mechanic and pilot of the L-Gaim`s support vehicle, The Works. He initially has a goal of joining the Poseidal military, but multiple attempts end in failure and he remains a loyal ally of Daba`s.

character.name: Lilith Fau
character.description: Lilith is the last remaining fairy in the Pentagona world. Daba finds Lilith in the possession of a man in the city of Prearmo on Koam and purchases her from him. Lilith`s short stature prevents her from piloting a Heavy Metal but she frequently accompanies Daba when he is piloting and helps with chores such as cooking. Later in the series she helps prevent a nuclear explosion at the asteroid base Palarta Star during which she is seriously injured for several episodes.

character.name: Rockley Ron
character.description: Member of the Elite 13 of the Poseidal Military (Number 9). Rockley is assigned to watch over Quwasan Olibee, and is stationed alongside her on the merchant ship Epsilon, and later the Krepaul. He pilots the Heavy Metal Calvary Temple. He remains loyal to Poseidal when Giwaza gathers much of the other Elite 13 members and rebels. While he participates in the final battle on Sveto, his ultimate fate is unknown.

character.name: Wassan Lune
character.description:
Member of the Elite 13 of the Poseidal Military (Number 6). Wassan is responsible for the planet Mizun and battles Daba and the rebels when they return to the planet later in the series, teaming up with Gavlet Gablae and Lily Hasshi. He is an honorable veteran soldier, loyal to Giwaza. He pilots the Heavy Metal Bat-Shu.
Wassan eventually participates in an operation to infiltrate the rebel forces, posing as a member of the Yaman Clan. During the operation he meets Daba face to face and finds that he reminds him of his deceased son. His true identity is later revealed and he sacrifices himself in the resulting battle to save Lily.

character.name: Lily Hasshi
character.description: Member of the Elite 13 of the Poseidal Military (Number 10). Lily shows up to assist Giwaza mid-way through the series and participates in multiple battles against the rebels along with Gavlet Gablae and Wassan Lune. Lily is a skilled Heavy Metal pilot, using the Heavy Metal G.Roon. As the conflict intensifies, Lily continues to pursue and battles the rebels but is killed in battle against Amu while over the planet Gastogal.

character.name: Maph McTomin
character.description:
Member of the Elite 13 of the Poseidal Military (Number 8). McTomin is responsible for the asteroid base Palarta Star, however is absent when Daba and the rebels arrive at the base and liberate it. He later joins up as a member of Giwaza`s rebellion. He is at the head of the vanguard in Giwaza`s initial assault on Sveto, piloting the Heavy Metal A.Taul V.
McTomin is saved when Heckler Mauser sacrifices himself during the initial assault while fighting Daba. He later battles Daba again and is killed during Giwaza`s second assault.

character.name: Anton Rando
character.description: One of Nei Mo Han`s wingmen. When Nei heads to Sveto, Anton remains on the Sarge Opus with Giwaza and is constantly accompanying him for the remainder of the series. He pilots the Heavy Metal Bat-Shu. Anton is one of the few members of the Poseidal military to survive the final battle and is taken captive by the rebels.

character.name: Hans Arahart
character.description:
Member of the Elite 13 of the Poseidal Military (Number 12). Hans is stationed at Sveto and remains loyal to Poseidal when Giwaza rebels. He pilots the Heavy Metal Calvary Temple.
When Amandara Kamandara reveals himself as the true Poseidal, Hans accompanies Mian to the Lachesis shrine in her attempt to stop him, where he dies.

character.name: Giwaza Lowau
character.description:
Member of the Elite 13 of the Poseidal Military (Number 3). Giwaza is head of the Elite 13 and highest ranked member of the Poseidal Military shown other than Poseidal herself. He is in a relationship with fellow Elite 13 member Nei Mo Han. Later in the series when Poseidal promotes Quwasan Olibee over him he gathers other members of the Elite 13 and rebels against Poseidal.
Giwaza survives an assassination attempt from Nei and kills her. His attemp to destroy Sveto with the asteroid base Metta ends in failure when Poseidal is able to move the entire city out of the way. While trying to escape he attacks Gavlet and Daba in his shuttle and is vaporized by the L-Gaim`s Buster Launcher.

character.name: Ted Devilas
character.description: Member of the Elite 13 of the Poseidal Military (Number 7). Ted joins up with Giwaza to rebel against Poseidal and is responsible for the planet Trydetol. He assists in Giwaza`s assault on Sveto. His final fate is unknown.

character.name: Baan Gania Killas
character.description:
Member of the Elite 13 of the Poseidal Military (Number 11). Baan joins up with Giwaza when he rebels against Poseidal. Following the death of Wassan Lune, he is sent to Mizun to gather supporters for Giwaza`s rebellion. He pilots the Heavy Metal Ashura Temple.
Baan is killed in the final episode when battling Daba and Kyao.

character.name: Nei Mo Han
character.description:
Member of the Elite 13 of the Poseidal Military (Number 4). Nei is a skilled Heavy Metal pilot, and pilots the Heavy Metal Auge. She is often accompanied by her wingmen, Anton Rando and Heckler Mauser. Nei is also the lover of Elite 13 leader Giwaza Lowau. She makes numerous attacks on the rebels throughout the series.
Nei is sent to Gastogal by Giwaza in an attempt to prove Full Flat as a traitor, but Nei`s long stay there results in him abandoning his loyalty to her. While there she meets with Poseidal (Mian) and is ordered by her to assasinate Giwaza. Her assassination attempt ends in failure and he kills her.
